text: Carlo Ausino (20 July 1938 â€“ 22 November 2020) was an Italian movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Messina, Kingdom of Italy. His career began in the 1960s. His best known works were Double Game (1977) and Tony: Another Double Game (1980). Ausino died in Turin, Italy on 22 November 2020 at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian movie directors Category:Cinematographers Category:People from Messina
title: Carlo Ausino
